extendedInfo.description: GoodRevu makes performance reviews easy. Our new Core Skills and Goals application will provide you with a range of skill and goal definitions to help review your coworkers and phrases for writing the perfect performance reviews using example comments. Here are just some of the skills available to you in this Android application:	-	Business Acumen	-	Leadership	-	Goal Setting	-	Creativity	-	Communication (verbal & written)	-	People Management	-	Work Effort	-	Transparency	-	Reliability	-	TeamworkAnd many, many more! Youâre also given a thirty day free trial to use our EasyRevu web-app. Drag-and-drop performance reviews save you even more time! And isnât that what you want most from technology? More time to do what you love?For our web-based tools to create full performance reviews with our patent-pending drag and drop performance appraisal tool, check out https://www.goodrevu.com .

reviews.title: Saved me
reviews.comment: I procrastinate on writing reviews. It\'s the worst party of my job. But this app practically write them for me this month!
reviews.author: A Google User
